12. 處理其他一般會計帳務。

15. 負責公司外帳之查核及登帳、結帳整理及稅務申報。
16. 配合財報需要，備妥查帳準備資料。

0,實驗室助手-Laboratory Helper – Seed viability tests,亞洲蔬菜研究發展中心,2023/02/04,"工作內容：

column2: 根據國際種子檢查標準進行種子活性測試.
進行主管要求之庫存項目之種子百粒重及含水率測定
協助管理種子之存放與提取，包括冷藏、乾燥、包裝及倉儲。確保種原保存之清潔、乾燥、包裝良好、標籤清晰。
以種原庫資訊系統之QR code上傳系統更新種原倉儲之品質與活性資料。
更新修改種原庫資訊系統之種原倉儲資料，確保其及時與正確。
監控種子乾燥、包裝與冷藏環境之運作。
清潔與維護：確保種子活性測試室、種子包裝室、冷藏保存室隨時保持清潔。
其他：其他主管交辦之臨時事項

column1: Job Responsibilities

column2: Doing the seed viability testing by following the ISTA rule.
Doing the seed moisture testing and hundred seed weight weighting assigned by the inventory specialist.
To assist in managing the cold stores, drying, packaging, and storage of seeds to ensure that the germplasm conserved is properly cleaned, dried, packed, and labeled for storage and withdrawal;
Update the seed quality and viability data to the Genebank information system by QR code uploading system.
Editing the inventory data and keeping it as real-time information by the Genebank information system.
Monitoring the functioning of the seed drying and packaging rooms and cold stores;
Cleaning and maintenance: keep the seed viability testing room, seed packaging room, cold stores, and corridor cleaned at all times;
Perform any other duties as required by the needs of the Center and as directed by the supervisor.

0,A 田間助手-Field Helper (Pepper),亞洲蔬菜研究發展中心,2023/02/04,"工作內容：

column2: 於田間或溫室內生產實驗用番椒種苗，內容包括:播種、間拔及施肥等；協助建造及維護網室。
協助所有番椒生產田間工作，內容包含:整地、移植、灌溉、修剪、立支柱、除草、噴藥及調查生長資料等。
進行番椒雜交，內容包括:收集花粉、花朵除雄、果實採收、種子收集烘乾及包裝等。
協助進行番椒育種材料的種子貯藏、紀錄等。

column1: Job Purpose
Execute routine tasks involving greenhouse, field, and seed management in the pepper breeding program .
Job Responsibilities

column2: Assist in all aspects of pepper field trial establishment and maintenance, including land preparation, field screenhouse construction, transplanting seedlings, irrigation, pruning and staking, weed removal, pesticide applications and data collection.
Facilitate the harvest of pepper fruits for seed extraction in the seed increase and in the segregating populations for advancement under the guidance of the Research Assistant and Scientist

0,42013BR - Construction Safety Engineer (台南),三福氣體股份有限公司,2023/01/31,Position Summary:

This position is the Construction Site Safety Engineer for Cryogenic (ASU) Projects which are executed by Taiwan Project Execution team. The incumbent is responsible for the management of all aspects of construction site safety per the scope of work.
The incumbent is expected to be expert on construction safety management, be able to provide excellent construction safety management to project execution for the Company.
The incumbent will work at Taiwan construction site.
Functional Responsibilities:

column2: Manage specified contractor’s daily construction safety activity, be able to identify issues and take corrective actions timely.
Ensure construction contractors follow all regulations and rules of Taiwan national/local government and Air Products safety specification & standards during construction.
Support safety supervisor to develop construction site specific safety training and audit plan as needed.
Monitor any third party or vendor site representative’s site safety activities.
Monitor and ensure contractor's compliance to Air Products Safety Standards.

Report to site safety supervisor of any potential safety issue and unsafe conditions before construction starts. This report must include the panned actions to promote safety awareness and eliminate unsafe conditions.
Go through the safety plan with the contractors and update man-hours during the weekly meeting, report to site safety supervisor.
Maintain contractor’s daily report and weekly reports as required in the appropriate construction engineering procedure (CEP).
Timely submit all necessary audit and reports to the Air Products site management team.
Keep an organized filing system in the field office.
Ensure compliance with specifications, site conditions, job safety analysis (JSA) safety work permits, building permits, and national health and safety requirements as per Taiwan.
Attend a weekly on-site construction meeting with the assigned contractors and their subcontractors as required in accordance with the appropriate CEP
Field safety status photographs shall be taken throughout the process of construction
Attend root cause analysis for site incidents. ",台南市,0,0,3年以上,化學工程相關 環境工程相關,大學、碩士,英文:聽 /略懂、說 /略懂、讀 /中等、寫 /中等,,,,"※目前此職位暫為合約制員工，1年1簽，會依照實際情況轉正。

column1: ※期滿另加發期滿獎金1個月
※工作上會需要處理文書作業，紙本/電腦皆需要

column2: Incumbent is expected to have bachelor’s degree on Chemical Engineering or EH&S.
State safety engineer certification is mandatory.
Good command of written and oral English.
Incumbent is expected to have 5+ year field construction safety supervision experience on world class projects. Petrochemical, Chemical or Industry Gas project experience is preferable.
Excellent analytical and reasoning ability.

Have an adequate standard of health and fitness (e.g., be able to climb in pipe racks, on ladders, to top of cold box, and walk extensively in the field daily, and be able to pass a respiratory fit test if needed).
Be able to work extended hours if needed, including weekends and some holidays.
Be following all company requirements including the drug and alcohol policy such as MSDS etc. "

0,MIS軟體開發工程師(南科),和鑫光電股份有限公司,2023/01/31,"Hi，謝謝你對和鑫MIS軟體開發工程師職缺的興趣。
和鑫創立於1999年，以「人類智慧生活最佳夥伴」為願景，聚焦觸控應用與TFT背板解決方案之發展，致力以策略創新與資源整合建立優勢。和鑫的觸控解決方案可分別應用於AMOLED與LCD 顯示器等不同終端領域，產品應用涵蓋穿戴裝置、手機、平板電腦、筆記型電腦、一體成型電腦與工業用顯示器產品；TFT背板解決方案可應用於電子標籤、電子書、電子看板等產品。
MIS軟體開發工程師之重點為負責各項軟體開發，順暢各業務端之作業程序，達成高品質有效率的資訊網絡。
MIS軟體開發工程師之詳細工作內容如下：
▧MIS Portal(入口網站)開發與管理。
▧透過SAP 資料庫/RFC 撰寫月/周/日報表。
▧MPS/採購平台/物管/倉管等相關網頁管理系統開發。
▧RPA自動化軟體機器人開發。
▧App開發(iOS, Android)。
▧電子簽核開發與管理。
期待與你相遇，一起打造更好的未來！
和鑫不僅鼓勵個人追求卓越表現，更注重團隊間的合作成果，在各種專案中提供同事必要的協助。我們會依組織當期的目標，動態地調整工作內容，執行跨部門支援與協作。",台南市,38000,60000,不拘,,大學以上,,,"ASP.NET, C#, Java, Objective-C, SWIFT, HTML, jQuery, CSS, Angular",,歡迎有企圖心/對程式系統開發有興趣的你加入！

0,39128BR_GEMTE_Construction (Sr.) Project Engineer_325,三福氣體股份有限公司,2023/01/30,"Project Engineer is responsible for those projects, or portions of projects, assigned to them by the Senior Project Manager. Individual projects are based on Customer, JV, or APCI merchant product or service requirement, which have been subsequently authorized by APCI management. Project scopes of supply may vary widely across the various Product Supply Teams but will generally include equipment supply, engineering design, construction, and start-up services. The primary challenge is to complete the project scope of supply while meeting the critical success factors, typically schedule, at minimum cost, to the required levels of quality, in a safe and efficient manner.

Project Engineer is responsible for those projects, or portions of projects, assigned to them by the Senior Project Manager. Individual projects are based on Customer, JV, or APCI merchant product or service requirement, which have been subsequently authorized by APCI management. Project scopes of supply may vary widely across the various Product Supply Teams but will generally include equipment supply, engineering design, construction, and start-up services. The primary challenge is to complete the project scope of supply while meeting the critical success factors, typically schedule, at minimum cost, to the required levels of quality, in a safe and efficient manner.

The Project Engineer is typically the individual who is assigned responsibility from the technical aspect for leading a project team in defining and completing an agreed upon scope of supply. The Project Engineer assumes ownership of the project budget, schedule, and technical quality to achieve the project and business objectives established at the start of the project. A typical project team consists of a matrix organization within APCI and may/will also include external contractors and consultants.

Typical project activities include: technical liaison to the business areas, direct participation in selling projects, the Customer’s single point of contact for communication and resolution project issues, review and interpretation of customer RFQs, participation in the definition of scope of supply and preparation of customer proposals, resource planning, defining and leading a project team, system design and specification, equipment procurement, equipment fabrication, drawing packages, value engineering, scope of supply documentation, contractor procurement, construction procurement and management, system commissioning and start-up, and project status and close out reports, etc.

Because a Project Engineer is a lead member of a matrix project team, there are key characteristics and traits required of the Project Engineer. The Project Engineer must exercise sound judgment and interpersonal skills in the coordination and direction of the individuals that comprise the project team.
PRINCIPAL ACCOUNTABILITIES
1. Assist the business area with definition of project scope of supply and with estimating costs for project scope of supply.
2. Provide technical point of contact to the business area for assigned projects.
3. Plan the execution of assigned projects and prepare scope of supply documentation after project authorization is secured.

4. Execute projects as assigned to meet or exceed project schedule, budget, and quality requirements. This includes, as required by the specific project, performing and/or the coordination of resources to complete the design, procurement fabrication, installation, start-up and commissioning tasks.

. Incumbent is expected to have a minimum of 15 years work experience in an industrial work environment with at least 5 years in a leadership position or in a long duration project management role with engineers in varying technical disciplines

. Industrial work experiences include a minimum of 5 years in either a chemical manufacturing facility, oil refinery, and steel mill. . a. High level hands-on proficiency in:
(1)medium voltage switchgear including troubleshooting with schematic drawings, protection relaying functionality, circuit breaker operations

(1)Medium voltage induction and synchronous motor operations, constructions and repairs,
(2)Electrical network operations and switching philosophies of equipment  in large power substations including power transformers, switchgears
(3)Operations, design and maintenance of electrically hazardous equipment,
(4)Variable frequency drives
(5)Standby diesel generator operations
(6)Uninterruptible Power Supplies

. 0,製程設備工程師,和鑫光電股份有限公司,2023/01/28,"Hi，謝謝你對和鑫製程設備工程師職缺的興趣。
和鑫創立於1999年，以「人類智慧生活最佳夥伴」為願景，聚焦觸控應用與TFT背板解決方案之發展，致力以策略創新與資源整合建立優勢。和鑫的觸控解決方案可分別應用於AMOLED與LCD 顯示器等不同終端領域，產品應用涵蓋穿戴裝置、手機、平板電腦、筆記型電腦、一體成型電腦與工業用顯示器產品；TFT背板解決方案可應用於電子標籤、電子書、電子看板等產品。
營運成果
▧全球第二大Rigid AMOLED觸控感應製造。
▧全球第一大穿戴式裝置觸控感應製造，市佔率90%。
製程設備工程師的重點任務為確保公司產品順利以高品質模式產出，因此我們重視每位工程師的養成訓練。入職前期以學習設備為基礎，爾後視個人學習狀況、職涯發展，以及組織需求，選擇深耕設備抑或往製程發展。
製程設備工程師之詳細工作內容如下：
